Method Detail

setSortMode

public void setSortMode(int mode)
                 throws JamException
Set the mode for sorting data, adjusting title and menu items as appropriate.

Parameters:
mode - the new mode for Jam to be in
Throws:
JamException - sends a message to the console if there is an inappropriate call
See Also:
ONLINE_DISK, ONLINE_TAPE, OFFLINE_DISK, OFFLINE_TAPE, FILE, REMOTE, NO_SORT

setSortModeFile

public void setSortModeFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                     throws JamException
Sets the sort mode to FILE and gives it the file name.

Parameters:
fileName - the file to be sorted?
Throws:
JamException - sends a message to the console if there is a problem

getSortMode

public int getSortMode()
Returns:
the current sort mode.
See Also:
setSortMode(int), setSortModeFile(String)

canSetSortMode

public boolean canSetSortMode()
Returns:
true is the mode can be changed

setRunState

public void setRunState(RunState rs)

Sets run state when taking data online. The run state mostly determints the state of control JMenu items. This method uses imformation set by setSortMode(). In addition:

  • Control JMenu items are enabled and disabled as appropriate.
  • Control JMenu items are states are set and unset as appropriate.
  • The JMenu bar is to show online sort.
  • Updates display status label .

Parameters:
rs - one of the possible run states control dialog box

getRunState

public RunState getRunState()
Returns:
the current run state

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method that is run to start up full Jam process

Parameters:
args - not used currently
